tag_list: entrepreneurship, social-media, branding, and-business-development, ip-communications, social-networking, blogger, direct-inward-dialing, telecommunications, running
overview: Suzanne Bowen is an expert in entrepreneurship, social media, branding, and business development especially in the area of IP communications. She is a speaker, presenter, trainer, mentor, marketer, early adopter, and evangelist for technologies and people she believes are valuable to the world. You will find evidence of this on Youtube, Viddler, Facebook, Linkedin, her TMCnet and personal and company blogs, TelecomYou, and Twitter.
